actions.text: Amendment SA 1869 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1869 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Wicker. (consideration: CR S72; text: CR S72) To authorize an annual appropriation of $40,200,000 through fiscal year 2021 to carry out the Integrated Coastal and Ocean Observation System Act of 2009 (33 U.S.C. 3601 et seq.).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1869 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Wicker.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1869 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To authorize an annual appropriation of $40,200,000 through fiscal year 2021 to carry out the Integrated Coastal and Ocean Observation System Act of 2009 (33 U.S.C. 3601 et seq.).
